handlers.code:
-------- Initialization --------
Screen.setScriptInput('')

DisplayMode = 'Table'
SortSwitch = 1

if Memory.hasKey('DisplayMode') == 1 then
    DisplayMode = Memory.getStringValue('DisplayMode')
end

if Memory.hasKey('SortSwitch') == 1 then
    SortSwitch = Memory.getIntValue('SortSwitch')
end

UpdateTime = 0

if Memory.hasKey('UpdateTime') == 1 then
    UpdateTime = Memory.getIntValue('UpdateTime')
end   

Hub1Updated = false
Hub2Updated = false
Hub3Updated = false
Hub4Updated = false
Hub5Updated = false
Hub6Updated = false
Hub7Updated = false
Hub8Updated = false

Hub1Parsed = false
Hub2Parsed = false
Hub3Parsed = false
Hub4Parsed = false
Hub5Parsed = false
Hub6Parsed = false
Hub7Parsed = false
Hub8Parsed = false

NHubs = exists(Hub1)+exists(Hub2)+exists(Hub3)+exists(Hub4)
+exists(Hub5)+exists(Hub6)+exists(Hub7)+exists(Hub8)

Page = 1
NumItems = 0

ItemsListName = {}
ItemsListQuantity = {}
ItemsListVolume = {}     
ItemsListMass = {}
ItemsList = {}

if Memory.hasKey('ItemsList') == 1 then
    ItemsList = json.decode(Memory.getStringValue('ItemsList'))
    NumItems = 0 
    unit.stopTimer('ReloadTimer') 
    
    for id, quantity in pairs(ItemsList) do
        
        NumItems = NumItems + 1
        
        itemData = system.getItem(tonumber(id))
        
        ItemsListName[id] = itemData["displayNameWithSize"]
        ItemsListQuantity[id] = quantity
        ItemsListVolume[id] = quantity*itemData["unitVolume"]        
        ItemsListMass[id] = quantity*itemData["unitMass"]

    end
    
end
UpdateData()

unit.setTimer('ListenforInput',1/10)

if Hub1 and not Hub1Updated then  
    H1 = Hub1.updateContent()
    if H1 > 0 then 
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H1+1)
    else
        Hub1Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

if Hub2 and not Hub2Updated then 
    H2 = Hub2.updateContent()
    if H2 > 0 then
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H2+1)
    else
        Hub2Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

if Hub3 and not Hub3Updated then 
    H3 = Hub3.updateContent()
    if H3 > 0 then
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H3+1)
    else
        Hub3Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

if Hub4 and not Hub4Updated then 
    H4 = Hub4.updateContent()
    if H4 > 0 then
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H4+1)
    else
        Hub4Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

if Hub5 and not Hub5Updated then  
    H5 = Hub5.updateContent()
    if H5 > 0 then 
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H5+1)
    else
        Hub5Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

if Hub6 and not Hub6Updated then 
    H6 = Hub6.updateContent()
    if H6 > 0 then
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H6+1)
    else
        Hub6Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

if Hub7 and not Hub7Updated then 
    H7 = Hub7.updateContent()
    if H7 > 0 then
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H7+1)
    else
        Hub7Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

if Hub8 and not Hub8Updated then 
    H8 = Hub8.updateContent()
    if H8 > 0 then
        unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',H8+1)
    else
        Hub8Updated = true
    end
    goto continue
end

::continue::

ParsedHubs = boolTonumber[Hub1Parsed]+
        boolTonumber[Hub2Parsed]+
        boolTonumber[Hub3Parsed]+
        boolTonumber[Hub4Parsed]+
        boolTonumber[Hub5Parsed]+
        boolTonumber[Hub6Parsed]+
        boolTonumber[Hub7Parsed]+
        boolTonumber[Hub8Parsed]

if ParsedHubs ~= NHubs then 
    unit.setTimer('ReloadTimer',1)
    goto waitforparse 
end

ReloadedHubs = boolTonumber[Hub1Updated]+
        boolTonumber[Hub2Updated]+
        boolTonumber[Hub3Updated]+
        boolTonumber[Hub4Updated]+
        boolTonumber[Hub5Updated]+
        boolTonumber[Hub6Updated]+
        boolTonumber[Hub7Updated]+
        boolTonumber[Hub8Updated]

if ReloadedHubs == NHubs then
    
    NumItems = 0 
    unit.stopTimer('ReloadTimer') 
    
    for id, quantity in pairs(ItemsList) do
        
        NumItems = NumItems + 1
        
        itemData = system.getItem(tonumber(id))
        
        ItemsListName[id] = itemData["displayNameWithSize"]
        ItemsListQuantity[id] = quantity
        ItemsListVolume[id] = quantity*itemData["unitVolume"]        
        ItemsListMass[id] = quantity*itemData["unitMass"]

    end
        
    Memory.setStringValue('ItemsList',json.encode(ItemsList))
    UpdateTime = system.getArkTime()
    UpdateData()
    
end

::waitforparse::

if NumItems > 0 then
    
    OldPage = Page
    
    Page = Page - math.floor(math.max(math.min(system.getMouseWheel(), 1), -1)+ 0.5);
    Page = math.max(math.min(Page, math.ceil(NumItems/3) - 2), 1); 
       
    if OldPage ~= Page then
        UpdateData()
    end
    
end

tablex = require("pl/tablex")

-- Converts "if variable" to 1,0 for easier checking.
function exists(var)
    if var then check=1 else check=0 end
    return check
end

-- Converts boolean to 1,0 for easier checking.
boolTonumber={[true]=1,[false]=0}

-- Collects OnContentUpdate from Hubs and merges into a single table indexed by ID.
function ReceivePayload(Hub)
    local Payload = Hub.getContent()

    for index, data in pairs(Payload) do
        if ItemsList[tostring(data.id)] then
            ItemsList[tostring(data.id)] = ItemsList[tostring(data.id)] + data.quantity
        else
            ItemsList[tostring(data.id)] = data.quantity
        end
    end

    return true
end


----------------


function UpdateData()
    
    ----- Build the Item Table -----   
    CompareFunction = '>'
    if SortSwitch == 1 then
        SortList = ItemsListVolume
    elseif SortSwitch == 2 then
        SortList = ItemsListQuantity
    elseif SortSwitch == 3 then
        SortList = ItemsListMass
    elseif SortSwitch == 4 then
        SortList = ItemsListName
        CompareFunction = '<'
    end
    
    counter = 0
    
    datatable = ""
    
    if DisplayMode == 'Cards' then
        for id, data in tablex.sortv(SortList,CompareFunction) do

            counter = counter + 1

            if counter > (Page-1)*3 and counter <= ((Page-1)*3 + 9) then

                current = system.getItem(tonumber(id))
                path = current["iconPath"]
                path = string.gsub(path,"resources_generated/", "")
                path = string.gsub(path,".png", "")
                path = string.gsub(path,"elements/", "@")
                path = string.gsub(path,"functional", ">")
                path = string.gsub(path,"iconslib/materialslib/env_", "<")
                path = string.gsub(path,"icon", "!")
                path = string.gsub(path,"_001", "ล")
                path = string.gsub(path,"part", "รง")

                local Q = tostring(math.ceil(ItemsListQuantity[id]))
                local V = tostring(math.ceil(ItemsListVolume[id]))
                local M = tostring(math.ceil(ItemsListMass[id]))
                local I = path
                local N = ItemsListName[id]

                currentrow = Q .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. I .. "$" .. N

                datatable = datatable .. "#" .. currentrow

            end

        end
    elseif DisplayMode == 'Table' then
        for id, data in tablex.sortv(SortList,CompareFunction) do

            counter = counter + 1

            if counter > (Page-1)*3 and counter <= ((Page-1)*3 + 16) then

                current = system.getItem(tonumber(id))
                local Q = tostring(math.ceil(ItemsListQuantity[id]))
                local V = tostring(math.ceil(ItemsListVolume[id]))
                local M = tostring(math.ceil(ItemsListMass[id]))
                local I = "P"
                local N = ItemsListName[id]

                currentrow = Q .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. I .. "$" .. N

                datatable = datatable .. "#" .. currentrow

            end

        end
    end

    ----- Acquire the Header Info -----
    Header = ''
    if Hub1 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub1.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub1.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub1.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    if Hub2 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub2.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub2.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub2.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    if Hub3 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub3.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub3.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub3.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    if Hub4 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub4.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub4.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub4.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    if Hub5 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub5.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub5.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub5.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    if Hub6 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub6.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub6.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub6.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    if Hub7 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub7.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub7.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub7.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    if Hub8 then
        M = string.format('%.1f',Hub8.getItemsMass()/1000)
        V = string.format('%.1f',Hub8.getItemsVolume()/1000)
        C = string.format('%.1f',Hub8.getMaxVolume()/1000)
        Header = Header .. "$" .. M .. "$" .. V .. "$" .. C
    end
    
    ----- Info -----
    Info = tostring(NHubs) .. "$" .. tostring(Page) .. "$" .. tostring(math.ceil(NumItems/3) - 2) 
    .. "$" .. DisplayMode .. "$" .. tostring(SortSwitch) .. "$" .. tostring(system.getArkTime()-UpdateTime)
    
    ----- Compose Message -----
    Message = Info .. "&" .. Header .. "&" .. datatable 
    system.print(Message)
    Screen.setScriptInput(Message)
    
end
